thread.title: `Unique` multi-format 10 Heads Festival to debut this October in Delhi
thread.title_full: `Unique` multi-format 10 Heads Festival to debut this October in Delhi - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: `Unique` multi-format 10 Heads Festival to debut this October in Delhi
text:
*New Delhi, Oct 8 (ANI): Fests are usually genre- specific and the same concept becomes monotonous for the audience, however, Delhi/NCR seems to be in luck as India's first multi-format festival is all set to debut in the city this October.*
New Delhi, Oct 8 (ANI): Fests are usually genre- specific and the same concept becomes monotonous for the audience, however, Delhi/NCR seems to be in luck as India's first multi-format festival is all set to debut in the city this October. Trifecta Entertainment Pvt. Ltd. Has announced its newest family-friendly experience to kick off the festive season with a unique, multi-dimensional four-day festival which is actually 10 festivals rolled into one the 'big daddy of festivals' packed in ten key interest areas ranging from music to food, fashion to arts and shopping to technology. Some of the 10 heads includes music fest Band Baja Bass, the gastronomical experience titled Foodistaan, Toddyfest - a festival of drinkables, and India's first ever Festival of Magic & Illusion festival titled Jaadunagari among others. The piece de resistance of the 10 Heads festival will be the UNBURNING, a special showcase that will be led by the prodigious 'Laserman' from Italy. Laserman's show is the show of the moment, a show of manipulation of laser light, creating illusion and interacting with the audience. This unique experience, which is aiming to revive India's great tradition of 'the family outing will be held from October 22-25 at Dhanchiri Camping Resort, NH-8, Delhi - Gurgaon Toll, Gurgaon. (ANI) Â»
